required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study Of Cabozantinib Treatment In Patients With Unresectable, Locally Advanced Or Metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma Who Progressed After Previous Treatment With Checkpoint Inhibitors
clinical_study.official_title: Non - Interventional, Retrospective Study Of Cabozantinib Treatment In Patients With Unresectable, Locally Advanced Or Metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma Who Progressed After Previous Treatment With Checkpoint Inhibitors

brief_summary.textblock: To understand the epidemiology, treatment patterns and outcomes of patients with metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma (mRCC). Data from mRCC patients who received cabozantinib versus non-cabozantinib Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor (TKI) (a type of targeted cancer drug) immediately after Check Point Inhibitor (CPI) treatment (a type of immunotherapy that blocks proteins that stop the immune system from attacking the cancer cells) in US community oncology practices will be analyzed.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From start of index treatment until 6 months of follow up or end of the treatment or death whichever occurs first

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From start of index treatment until end of the treatment or death whichever occurs first
From start of index treatment until death or end of the study whichever occurs first
From date of index treatment response and the earliest date of progressive disease
From start of index treatment until the earliest of death, end of study database, or evidence of Progressive Disease
From start of index treatment until treatment discontinuation
From start of index treatment until treatment discontinuation
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients who had dose reduction/change as compared to the starting dose during index period

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From start of index treatment until treatment discontinuation
From start of index treatment until treatment discontinuation
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients who had been hospitalized (with reason of hospitalization when available)

secondary_outcome.measure: Drug discontinuation due to its toxicity
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From start of index treatment until treatment discontinuation (through study completion)
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients discontinuing index regimens due to its toxicity

clinical_study.condition: Locally Advanced or Metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma

arm_group.arm_group_label: non cabozantinib Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitors (TKI) arm

intervention.description: Intervention description (FDA Label): kinase inhibitor indicated for the treatment of patients with advanced renal cell carcinoma (RCC).

intervention.intervention_name: All authorized TKI monotherapies in advanced RCC per FDA label in advanced RCC
intervention.description: As per authorized FDA label in advanced RCC
intervention.arm_group_label: non cabozantinib Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitors (TKI) arm
